cons: It contains tannin that can increase the amount of acid in your stomach. Excess acid can lead to digestive issues including constipation, acid reflux, and nausea.
name: Green Tea
pros: Green tea is made from unoxidized leaves and is one of the less processed types of tea.
Loaded with polyphenol antioxidants, including catechin called EGCG, having various beneficial effects on health.
It also contains the amino acid L-theanine, which can work synergistically with caffeine to improve brain function.
Green tea boost the metabolic rate and increase fat burning, especially in the abdominal area
Green tea has powerful antioxidants that may protect against cancer.
